subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer retained his Tour of Utah title, locking onto Sergio Henao’s back wheel on the final climb up Little Cottonwood Canyon in Snowbird.
snippet: Levi Leipheimer retained his Tour of Utah title, locking onto Sergio Henao’s back wheel on the final climb up Little Cottonwood Canyon in Snowbird.
